fields.name: Abilties:
fields.value: Boost the morale of a Linchpin

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Boosting causes the player to use their ability twice (they will he aware and can choose for the second ability)
- You cannot boost the same player twice in a row
- Killing roles will instead get Basic Defense for night and following night
- If a role cannot use their ability twice, or a Killing role already has Basic Defense, they will gain Roleblock and Control Immunity for the night and following night
